about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Vertexplus Technologies Limited is an ISO 9001:2015 and ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certified Information Technology company. The company is engaged in consulting, outsourcing, infrastructure, and digital solutions and services.

Over the years, the company has gained experience across various industries and sectors. We collaborate with companies to fulfill their ever-evolving Information Technology needs and support their business with our enabling solutions to strengthen their current capabilities and build pathways for sustainable growth.

Vertexplus ensures quality and time delivery in the most cost-effective manner to determine the success of complex enterprise projects through five delivery models:

  • Off-shore Model
  • On-site Model
  • Hybrid Model
  • Global Model
  • Strategic Partnerships

faqs.question: What is the Vertexplus Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Vertexplus Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 1479600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹14.20 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹96 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on March 2, 2023, and closes on March 6, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Vertexplus Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Vertexplus Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Vertexplus Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Vertexplus Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Vertexplus Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Vertexplus Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Vertexplus Technologies IPO opens on March 2, 2023 and closes on March 6, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Vertexplus Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Vertexplus Technologies IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,15,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Vertexplus Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Vertexplus Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Vertexplus Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Vertexplus Technologies IPO will be done on Friday, March 10, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, March 14, 2023. Check the Vertexplus Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Vertexplus Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Vertexplus Technologies IPO listing date is on Wednesday, March 15, 2023.
